casebody.data:
Gertrude E. GELBIN, as Administratrix of the Goods, Chattels, and Credits of Edward Gelbin, Deceased, Appellee, v. The NEW YORK, NEW HAVEN & HARTFORD RAILROAD COMPANY, Appellant. No. 315. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 6, 1936. Edward R. Brumley, of New York City, for appellant. Feltenstein & Rosenstein, of New York Cily (Sidney J. Feltenstein, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
